description:
Use remove-text-properties instead of
remove-list-of-test-properties, since the latter is missing
from XEmacs.

Fixes issue 462.

messages.text:
Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review the following change.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e173d9576cb9 ***

Use remove-text-properties instead of
remove-list-of-test-properties, since the latter is missing
from XEmacs.

Fixes issue 462.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/181152

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 181152: Use remove-text-properties instead of
